actionable_tasks.title: Implement Circuit Breaker Pattern for Provider Failover
actionable_tasks.description: Add circuit breaker logic to the backend chat pipeline to handle provider outages gracefully, ensuring failover to backup LLM providers.
implementation_steps: Research and select a lightweight circuit breaker library (e.g., opossum).
Wrap provider API calls with circuit breaker logic.
Configure thresholds and fallback behaviors.
Add logging for circuit breaker state changes.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Request Correlation IDs for End-to-End Tracing
actionable_tasks.description: Integrate request correlation IDs into the backend chat pipeline to enable tracing across services and improve debugging.
implementation_steps: Generate a unique correlation ID for each incoming request.
Pass the correlation ID through all service calls.
Log the correlation ID with all relevant events.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement MongoDB Compound Indexes for Analytics Queries
actionable_tasks.description: Create compound indexes in MongoDB to optimize analytics queries and improve dashboard performance.
implementation_steps: Identify frequently queried fields in analytics data.
Create compound indexes for these fields in MongoDB.
Test query performance before and after index creation.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement TTL Indexes for Telemetry Data Rotation
actionable_tasks.description: Set up TTL indexes in MongoDB to automatically rotate old telemetry data and manage storage efficiently.
implementation_steps: Determine the retention period for telemetry data.
Create TTL indexes for telemetry collections.
Verify data rotation by monitoring collection size over time.

actionable_tasks.title: Add Response Streaming for Large Datasets
actionable_tasks.description: Implement response streaming in the backend analytics endpoints to handle large datasets efficiently and improve user experience.
implementation_steps: Modify analytics endpoints to support streaming responses.
Test streaming with large datasets to ensure performance and reliability.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Prometheus Metrics Export for Alerting
actionable_tasks.description: Integrate Prometheus metrics export in the backend to enable alerting and monitoring of key performance indicators.
implementation_steps: Install and configure Prometheus client library.
Expose key metrics via a dedicated endpoint.
Test metric collection and alerting setup.

actionable_tasks.title: Complete Spotify Authentication Interface
actionable_tasks.description: Finish the frontend implementation of the Spotify authentication interface to allow users to connect their Spotify accounts.
implementation_steps: Implement OAuth flow for Spotify authentication.
Handle authentication success and error states.
Test the interface with a test Spotify account.

actionable_tasks.title: Implement Chat Interface for Conversational Music Search
actionable_tasks.description: Develop the frontend chat interface to enable users to search for music using natural language queries.
implementation_steps: Design and implement the chat UI components.
Integrate with backend chat pipeline.
Test conversational search functionality.
